name: Robert D. Anderson and the Legacy of Cthulhu
name_original: Robert D. Anderson and the Legacy of Cthulhu
description:
Robert D. Anderson and the Legacy of Cthulhu is an action-shooter game developed by Homegrown Games Austria. It was originally released in 2007. It was published by JoWooD Productions.
You can play Robert D. Anderson and the Legacy of Cthulhu on PC.
